import React from 'react'; import { Route, Switch, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import * as ROUTES from '../../constants/routes' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import LandingPage from '../Landing' import SignUpPage from '../SignUp/index.js' import SignOut from '../SignOut' import Home from '../Home' import Menu from '../Menu' import PasswordChangePage from '../Profile/password_change.js' import ProfileChangePage from '../Profile/profile_change.js' import Restaurants from '../Restaurants' import About from '../About' import CheatingToolbar from '../Navigation/CheatingToolbar' import Navbar from '../Navigation/Navbar' import SideDrawer from '../SideDrawer/SideDrawer.js' import Backdrop from '../Backdrop/Backdrop.js' import Friends from '../Friends' import '../../stylesheets/Landing.css' import '../../stylesheets/SignUp.css' import '../../stylesheets/Restaurants.css' import '../../stylesheets/Menu.css' import '../../stylesheets/Home.css' import '../../stylesheets/SearchBar.css' import '../../stylesheets/Backdrop.css' import '../../stylesheets/DrawerToggleButton.css' import '../../stylesheets/SideDrawer.css' import '../../stylesheets/CheatingToolbar.css' import '../../stylesheets/Loader.css' import '../../stylesheets/Navbar.css' import '../../stylesheets/Friends.css' import '../../stylesheets/main-logo.css' import '../../stylesheets/titles.css' import '../../stylesheets/button.css' import '../../stylesheets/form.css' import '../../stylesheets/about.css' const App = ({ loggedIn, sideDrawer }) => { let routes if (loggedIn) { routes = ( <> ) } else { routes = ( ) } return (
{routes}
) } const mapStateToProps = ({ firebase, ui }) => ({ loggedIn: firebase.auth.uid, sideDrawer: ui.sideDrawerOpen, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(App)
